name: Magic in Wanderhome: Expanded
description:
Magic in Wanderhome: Expanded

Magic in Wanderhome: Expanded is inspired by unfinished works started by Jay Dragon, available on his Patreon page.  This provides a magic system for the fantastic Wanderhome tabletop role-playing game.   

Wanderhome is copyright of Possum Creek Games Inc.

Magic in Wanderhome: Expanded is an independent production by Eric Drew and Andrew Aulenback and is not affiliated with Possum Creek Games Inc. It is published under the Wanderhome Third Party License.

Made possible by the generous Wanderhome Third Party License.
